participant_1.background:
I love to eat fresh produce from my family's farm, especially after a long hike.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.
I live far from my family, but I love them.
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
I am a passionate educator who enjoys bringing the joy of learning to life in my students.

participant_2.background:
I like to enjoy some comfort food like spaghetti and meatballs when I'm not counting calories.
i have won an olympic medal.
I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time.
I take pride in my appearance.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just hanging out with my cats and watching a movie. What are you up to?
I'm doing well too! I'm just getting ready for a hike in the mountains.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love hiking. Do you go hiking often?
I try to go hiking as often as I can. It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree! I love being outdoors. What's your favorite thing about hiking?
I think my favorite thing about hiking is the sense of accomplishment I feel when I reach the top of a mountain. It's also a great way to see new places and meet new people.
I totally agree! Hiking is a great way to get out and explore. I've met some of my best friends on hiking trails.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new hiking buddies. Maybe we could hike together sometime?
That would be great! I'd love to hike with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm planning my next hike.
